decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawings: Existing Ground Floor Plan drawing no.Adg0003 Rev D, Existing Outbuilding Elevation Plan drawing no.Adg0004 Rev B, Existing Outbuilding Elevation Plan drawing no.Adg0005 Rev D and Existing Elevation Windows and Doors drawing no.Adg0006 Rev D
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Ealing's Local Plan policy DAA, policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).
description: Retention of converted and extended detached garage incorporating metal cladding (Retrospective)
